short_summary: Cleaning of catch basins, sumps, oil water separators and other installed utilities
description: The procurement is for all labour, materials, supervision, transportation and equipment necessary to perform cleaning services for catch basins, sumps, oil water separators and other installed utilities on an as and when requested basis to the Department of National Defence (DND), Canadian Forces Base (CFB), Garrison Petawawa. There are 2 streams applicable to this requirement, Stream 1 All Suppliers and Stream 2 Indigenous Suppliers – Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. Streams will be evaluated separately, with the lowest priced offer for each stream issued a Standing Offer.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice for Cleaning Services
## Contract Details

### Contract Title
W6889-240171 Clean Catch Basins Petawawa

### Contract Type
Request for Standing Offer (RSO)

### Request Number
WS4574502673 - Doc 4607776681

### Amendment Number
2

### Closing Date
2024-07-09 14:00 EDT

### Expected Contract Start Date
2024-07-10

### Expected Contract End Date
2027-07-31

### UNSPSC
Refuse disposal and treatment (76120000)

### Procurement Category
SRV

### Notice Type
Request for Standing Offer (Démarche d’offres à commandes)

### Method of Procurement
Competitive - Open bidding (Procédure concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

### Evaluation Criteria
Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

### Brief Description
Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide all labour, materials, supervision, transportation, and equipment necessary for cleaning services for catch basins, sumps, and other installed utilities at Department of National Defence (DND) Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Garrison Petawawa, as-and-when requested.

## Additional Details

* Streams:
	+ Stream 1: All Suppliers
	+ Stream 2: Indigenous Suppliers - Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (SEBB)
* The two streams will be evaluated separately, with the lowest priced offer for each stream awarded a Standing Offer.
* CanadaBuys posting closing time is **_WITHDRAWN_**, and all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the amended closing date.

## Contact Information

* Name: Jason Scott
* Email: [jason.scott@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jason.scott@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Location: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), GPI Section

## Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19870581?extsite=MTk4NzA1ODFfQU4wMTQ4NDLYMDk1NEg==

Note that I kept only original text that contains relevant information. Any irrelevant or duplicate details given were excluded. The text was restyled in a more professional tone and the formatting has been changed to use markdown. I reworded the introduction to make it clear that this is a RSO and
